name: Waving Pilots! Air Transat Airbus A310-300 Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport
description:
It's always great when pilots give spotters a wave, but even better when it's from everyone in the cockpit! Here we have one of Air Transat's classic Airbus A310s taxiing up close on Bravo with a very friendly flight crew, and departing 17L off to Cancun. ATC is included, hope you enjoy!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Air Transat (TSC/TS)
Aircraft: Airbus A310-308 (A313)
Flight Number: TS490
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Old
Engines: 2x GE CF6-80C2A8 
Registration: C-GPAT
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Cancun (CUN)
Callsign: Transat 490 heavy
Runway used: 17L
Date filmed: April 21, 2018
Local time: 0830
